name: january 17th, 1981
description:
meant to be a nostalgia simulator, but became something different with time.

contains:

- a (closeted/private) lgbt relationship, with implied homophobia

- a possibly overprotective boyfriend

- supernatural elements

- and a not entirely unhappy ending (plus some blood).

note: there are cutscenes shown later on. press the down key (or swipe downward) to progress through them.

bitsy was made by adam.

classic image-to-bitsy was made by ruin/tinybird.
